ovdesc.p: Within this file are defined parameters which determine some of the controls by which the system operates. These are as follows;
1. Classification of the transaction codes used on the debit and credit netted entries.
2. The range of value dates used to propagate transactions to the NETTING file for agreement.
3. Establish when NETTING file records are purged to history.
This file contains a single record named SYSTEM.

desc.p: Defines the number of days before TODAY that the BATCH procedure will purge NETTING records to history.
The purge will only occur if a value is supplied for this field.
Format nnnC or nnnW where nnn = 1 to 3 numeric characters W = Working days C = Calender days (Optional input)
Defines the number of days ahead of today that will be used as the selection criteria in CREATE.NETTING.
If no value supplied CREATE.NETTING will automatically build netting groups TWO WORKING DAYS ahead.
Format nnC or nnW where nn = 1 to 2 numeric characters W = Working days C = Calender days (Optional input)
Defines the transaction code to be used on the credit entry generated by the NETTING sub-system when NETTING payments.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters Transaction Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
Defines the transaction code to be used on the debit entry by the NETTING sub-system for the NETTING of payments.
1-10(Max Value) numeric characters Transaction Code. (Mandatory Input)
The Maximum value is specified in EB.OBJECT for TRANSACTION.
